author: Corinne Ramey
title: Convicted Manhattan Bomber Asks for Family Visits, Educational Opportunities, While Serving Life Sentence
text:
A lawyer representing the man convicted of detonating a bomb in Manhattanâ€™s Chelsea neighborhood in 2016 argued his client should be allowed to see family and have educational opportunities while spending his life in prison.
Ahmad Rahimi, convicted in October of using weapons of mass destruction and other crimes, is scheduled to be sentenced next week. The judge is required by law to hand him a life sentence.
